<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Choose-your-own">Choose your own<a class="anchor-link" href="#Choose-your-own">&#182;</a></h2><p>Here we choose one algorithm to classify and measure the accuracy. We will initially try k-nearest neighbors.</p>
<p>Let us import necessary stuff first..</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">sys</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">class_vis</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">prettyPicture</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">prep_terrain_data</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">makeTerrainData</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">tree</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">accuracy_score</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pylab</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pl</span>

<span class="n">features_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">features_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">makeTerrainData</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Let us first check if Decision tree works. This gives us a skeleton to work on.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">classify</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">features_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">min_samples</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="c1">### your code goes here--should return a trained decision tree classifer</span>
    <span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">features_train</span>
    <span class="n">Y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">labels_train</span>
    <span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tree</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DecisionTreeClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">min_samples_split</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">min_samples</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">clf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">Y</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">clf</span>

<span class="c1"># train</span>
<span class="n">clf_2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">classify</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">features_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># predict</span>
<span class="n">labels_pred_2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">clf_2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">features_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># accuracy</span>
<span class="n">acc_min_samples_split_2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">accuracy_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">labels_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_pred_2</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Accuracy: </span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">acc_min_samples_split_2</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Accuracy: 0.912
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">prettyPicture</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">clf_2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">features_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,
"
>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Let us next try using <a href="http://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/generated/sklearn.neighbors.KNeighborsClassifier.html#sklearn.neighbors.KNeighborsClassifier">k-nearest neighbor</a> from sci-kit</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.neighbors</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">KNeighborsClassifier</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">classify</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">features_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_neighbors</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="c1">### your code goes here--should return a trained decision tree classifer</span>
    <span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">features_train</span>
    <span class="n">Y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">labels_train</span>
    <span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">KNeighborsClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_neighbors</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">clf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">Y</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">clf</span>

<span class="c1"># train</span>
<span class="n">clf_k</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">classify</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">features_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># predict</span>
<span class="n">labels_pred_k</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">clf_k</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">features_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># accuracy</span>
<span class="n">acc_k</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">accuracy_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">labels_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_pred_k</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Accuracy: </span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">acc_k</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Accuracy: 0.936
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">prettyPicture</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">clf_k</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">features_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Improve-accuracy?">Improve accuracy?<a class="anchor-link" href="#Improve-accuracy?">&#182;</a></h1><p>Let us try increasing neighbors..</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># train</span>
<span class="n">n_neighbors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">4</span>

<span class="n">clf_k</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">classify</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">features_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_neighbors</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># predict</span>
<span class="n">labels_pred_k</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">clf_k</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">features_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># accuracy</span>
<span class="n">acc_k</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">accuracy_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">labels_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labels_pred_k</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Accuracy: </span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">acc_k</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

<div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Accuracy: 0.94
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Beyond 4, accurancy decreases and so is below 3. So this looks optimal for now.</p>
<p>Good. 94% accuracy is good.</p>

</div>
</div>
